welcomeMsg.text:
Welcome to the world of Pokémon! 🌍🔥💧⚡️
Get ready to embark on an incredible journey filled with adventure, battles, and amazing creatures!
Here are a few things to help you get started:
🌟 Choose your starter Pokémon There are various choices. They will be your loyal companion throughout your journey.
🗺️ Explore different regions, capture wild Pokémon, and expand your team with a diverse range of species.
⚔️ Challenge gym leaders and prove your skills in epic Pokémon battles.
🎁 Earn badges, collect rare items, and unlock new abilities for your Pokémon.
Are you ready to become a Pokémon Trainer? Let the adventure begin! 🚀

startMsg.text:
Welcome to the bot
Use /help to get started.
